item.title: Learning How to Learn
item.description: A summary of my takeaways on the Coursera class titled, 'Learning How to Learn.'

item.title: Napping: The Right Way
item.description: Are naps important? How can we functionally take a nap if we are supposed to be working all day? This article tackles some of those questions.

item.title: Why Sleep Matters Now More Than Ever
item.description: These are my notes on rom the TED Talks Daily podcast, Why sleep matters now more than ever, by Matt Walker.
